learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Plotted points should be clearly marked, for example as small crosses (x).

learning_objectives.description: Understand what is meant by positive, negative and zero correlation.
Draw by eye, interpret and use a straight line of best fit.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: A line of best fit: should be a single ruled line drawn by inspection, should extend across the full data set, does not need to coincide exactly with any of the points but there should be a roughly even distribution of points either side of the line over its entire length.
